TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Determina los valores de seguridad de un enlace.

span.span: Determines the security settings for a binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cualquier `ProtectionLevel` la configuración de un transporte se omite si el se establece en None.Any `ProtectionLevel` settings of a transport are ignored if the is set to None. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] el `ProtectionLevel` propiedad, vea [nivel de protección descripción](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md). the `ProtectionLevel` property, see [Understanding Protection Level](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md). [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] seguridad y cómo esta propiedad afecta a las características de seguridad general, consulte [proteger Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/securing-services.md) y [Programming WCF Security](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/programming-wcf-security.md). [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] security and how this property affects general security features, see [Securing Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/securing-services.md) and [Programming WCF Security](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/programming-wcf-security.md). [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] el modo de transporte, consulte [seguridad de transporte](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/transport-security.md). the transport mode, see [Transport Security](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/transport-security.md). Tenga en cuenta que si elige TransportWithMessageCredential, a continuación, el valor establecido o se omite.Note that if you choose TransportWithMessageCredential, then the value set in or is ignored. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se establece la propiedad `Mode` de un .The following example sets the `Mode` property of the . Para obtener más ejemplos, vea [Cómo: establecer el modo de seguridad](~/docs/framework/wcf/how-to-set-the-security-mode.md).For more examples, see [How to: Set the Security Mode](~/docs/framework/wcf/how-to-set-the-security-mode.md). [!code-csharp[c_SettingSecurityMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_settingsecuritymode/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_SettingSecurityMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_settingsecuritymode/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode Message = int32(2)

summary.span: La seguridad se proporciona mediante la seguridad del mensaje SOAP.

span.span: Security is provided using SOAP message security.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode Transport = int32(1)

summary.span: La seguridad se proporciona utilizando un transporte seguro (por ejemplo, HTTPS).

span.span: Security is provided using a secure transport (for example, HTTPS).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode TransportWithMessageCredential = int32(3)

summary.span: Un transporte seguro (por ejemplo, HTTPS) proporciona integridad, confidencialidad y autenticación de servidor mientras la seguridad del mensaje SOAP proporciona la autenticación del cliente.

span.span: A secure transport (for example, HTTPS) provides integrity, confidentiality, and authentication while SOAP message security provides client authentication.
